price: Ɛne Samuudfoͻ ne Lut nkorͻfoͻ no, ne Nnua mu tenafoͻ no. Woi nom ne Akuo-akuo no.
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
